mapper.select: SELECT acc.account_number, acc.account_name, acc.current_balance, acc.available_balance, acc.currency, acc.type FROM accounts AS acc JOIN customer_accounts AS ca ON acc.account_number = ca.account_number WHERE ca.customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accounts (account_number, account_name, current_balance, available_balance, currency, type) VALUES (#{accountNumber}, #{accountName}, #{currentBalance}, #{availableBalance}, #{currency}, #{type})
